message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor,  I think it's a good starting point for negotiation.
Your offer was a bit unfair to me. Let's be reasonable, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Time is ticking and inflation is eating away at our potential gains.
Let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to split the money evenly. We both lose out if we can't agree quickly.
